name: opena3xx-flight-deck-webapp
description: OpenA3XX Flight Deck - A modern Angular application for managing flight simulator hardware

scripts.start: npm run setup && npx ng serve
scripts.build: npm run setup && npx ng build
scripts.build:prod: npm run setup && npx ng build --configuration production
scripts.watch: npm run setup && npx ng build --watch --configuration development
scripts.test: npm run setup && npx ng test
scripts.test:ci: npm run setup && npx ng test --watch=false --browsers=ChromeHeadless --code-coverage
scripts.lint: npm run setup && npx ng lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run setup && npx ng lint --fix
scripts.e2e: npm run setup && npx ng e2e
scripts.docs: npm run setup && npx compodoc -p tsconfig.doc.json -s
scripts.docs:serve: npm run setup && npx compodoc -p tsconfig.doc.json -s -w
scripts.build:docs: npm run setup && npx compodoc -p tsconfig.doc.json -d documentation
scripts.publish:electron: npm run build:prod && electron-packager . OpenA3XX Flight Deck --all
